Posts.Content: Jun 23, 2014 08:28PM Ally2345 wrote: IzzyB- Thanks for responding.  One more month until my PS appointment then vacation then the exchange surgery so I am sure it will go quickly but it feels like the appointment will never get here.  I guess I can't wait to discuss implants, etc.  That's a great idea about Pinterest...the kids are always looking at me like "you want to do what???"  Haha!  Enjoy the summer!! Allly
Posts.Title: Limbo-land...btwn surgeries Ally2345 Ally2345

Posts.Content: Ally2345 wrote: Hey all- I had my BMX in May and will have my exchange surgery in August.  My TEs are expanded to where I want them, i.e. done with fills, and I just feel sort of at a loss.  The last few weeks have been so busy making decisions, prepping for surgery and recovering from surgery and then suddenly, I just have to wait.  I am going to physical therapy so that helps but it is more of a feeling like "I should be doing something" yet not sure what that is.  Curious if any others have had this limbo time and how you filled it.  I feel like I keep trying to research decisions that I have already made (not always good but sometimes provides reassurance) and researching 3-D nipple options (another decision).  Anyway, not depressed or sad but rather just feel in limbo... Ally Dx 3/23/2014, DCIS, 2cm, Stage 0, Grade 2, 0/1 nodes, ER+/PR- Surgery 4/27/2014 Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel Surgery 5/4/2014 Mastectomy: Right; Prophylactic mastectomy: Left Surgery 5/4/2014 Reconstruction (left): Tissue expander placement; Reconstruction (right): Tissue expander placement Surgery 8/10/2014 Reconstruction (left); Reconstruction (right) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Limbo-land...btwn surgeries Ally2345 Ally2345
